餓死.definition: to starve to death; to be very hungry

餓殍載道.definition: starved corpses fill the roads (idiom); state of famine

餓莩載道.definition: starved corpses fill the roads (idiom); state of famine

餓莩遍野.definition: starving people everywhere (idiom); a state of famine

餓虎撲食.definition: like a hungry tiger pouncing on its prey

餓鬼.definition: sb who is always hungry; glutton; (Buddhism) hungry ghost
